import React, { useState } from 'react' import * as busApi from '../api/bus-search' const SearchBus = () => { const [searchResult, setSearchReasult] = useState([]) const [travelPlan, setTravelPlan] = useState({}) const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() busApi.busSearch(travelPlan) .then(response => response.data) .then(data => { setSearchReasult(data.result) }) } const renderItems = (searchResult) =>{ return searchResult.map((result=>{ })) } const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { const fieldValue = e.target.value setTravelPlan({ ...travelPlan, [field]: fieldValue }) console.log(travelPlan) } return (
